backend/main.mo: Stores and manages per‑user favorite quotes and prayers with authorization checks and add/remove/query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component providing theme support and rendering the router and toast system.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, footer, and main content wrapper including attribution.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication toggle button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/FavoriteButton.t: Heart‑icon button to add or remove favorites with auth gating and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, links, authentication button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Dialog displaying a full‑screen view of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Wrapper handling loading, error, and empty UI states for data‑fetching components.
frontend/src/components/SignInPromptDial: A dialog component prompting users to sign in via Internet Identity, handling login and UI states.
frontend/src/content/gallery.ts: Defines gallery image metadata and exports a list of devotional-themed image entries.
frontend/src/content/prayers.ts: Provides a Prayer interface and a collection of devotional prayer texts with IDs and titles.
frontend/src/content/quotes.ts: Defines a Quote interface and exports a large list of devotional quotes with optional authors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and removing favorite quotes and prayers using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a devotional color palette and theme utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx: Displays the user's favorited quotes and prayers, handling authentication state and loading via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a grid of gallery images with a lightbox for viewing selected items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section and links to quotes, prayers, and gallery sections.
frontend/src/pages/PrayersPage.tsx: Lists devotional prayers with support for marking favorites and handling loading via QueryState.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesPage.tsx: Shows sacred quotes and allows authenticated users to favorite items with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines all app routes using TanStack Router and composes them under a common AppLayout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animation support.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature requirements, and image asset needs for a Radha‑Krishna themed app.
